name: Eternal Abode
description:
Man is the only animal that has the need to bury their dead. Whether burying or cremating the corpse, different beliefs about the fate of the spirit generate different dynamics of burial.
the grave as an eternal abode.

Cezar family tombstone, extremely well cared, with a stone sculpture. Found in the São Francisco de Paula municipal Cemetery in Curitiba/PR Brazil.

photogrammetry scan - 2022 Higor Casagrande
